I don't have a job. I'm just enjoying the view up here.
The noble elf Caranim enchants people with the Spark of the Phoenix. He lives in the infamous tree south of the elven village, Ashbere.

I have heard Zeltone teach the spiritual shielding to those who can find him. It's not often possessors of one of the five blessings is so isolated, but he lives in the desert somewhere... in the north-east, if I'm not mistaken.

This blessing can be enchanted upon you by Omere, who lives on an island in the Sherian Seas. Travel to him from Agatone, but treat him with respect, as he is one of the oldest men alive in the world.
Ah. An old friend, well... perhaps not a friend really, but I used to know him... anyways, he can teach you the Embrace of the Lost Lands. You can find him north-west of Celeres in a peculiar tower.
I don't have any earthly possessions except my clothes. But I do have some magical powers - I can gift you with a blessing.

There are 5 different blessings which you can recieve from five different persons. These are the Spark of the Phoenix, the Embrace of the Lost Lands, the Fire of the Suns, the Wisdom of Solitude and the Spiritual Shielding. I can bless you with the Fire of the Suns.
I think I remember him. Truly a great poker player. I never stood a chance against his skill with the cards.
I used to be really great at poker. But I stopped playing, I lost my money too fast.

Ashbere is a very grand city built by the elves. Unfortunately, these elves are not very friendly. One of the possessors of the five blessings was rejected from Ashbere, and now lives in a treehouse close by.
Omere is truly an amazing man. I don't know how old he is, but I would guess far beyond one hundred.
Zeltone is a mystic man. He lives in Dustwit, but I don't know where. I've been told that he is in the north-east part of the island, though.
I can see all Casteldine from here.
I wish I could see all Lithaton from this tower.
A decent view, really. I can almost see all the way to Celeres.
Good bye. You are welcome back anytime.
